caption.p: Annexin V staining to measure apoptosis. A549 cells were treated with active compounds ( 6a, 5c– e, 5 g and 5 h) or standard compounds (doxorubicin and staurosporine) at determined IC 50 value for 36 h to induce apoptosis in 2 D cell culture (V: viable cells; A: apoptotic; LA: late apoptotic; N: necrotic).
